messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Bravewriter Web site;conference
messages.msgSnippet: kbcdlovejo@aol.com wrote: In a message dated 7/3/2003 11:01:06 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... But that will all change on the weekend of August 22-24, 2003 in
messages.messageBody:
kbcdlovejo@... wrote:
In a message dated 7/3/2003 11:01:06 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
glad2bmadly@... writes:


> I have a few homeschooling friends who don't unschool (heck, I don't know
> anyone in person who unschools)

But that will all change on the weekend of August 22-24, 2003 in Columbia, SC
at the Live & Learn Unschooling Conference!

~Kelly


hee hee, never a missed opportunity, eh? I am so excited about meeting unschoolers in the flesh! I am bringing a mom who i hope will become an unschooler while there.

madeline

messages.subject: Bravewriter Web site
messages.msgSnippet: Julie, I just went to your web site and it is wonderful.  Gillen and I recently read _Farmer Boy_ so it was fun to see the work you had done on it.  From
messages.messageBody:
Julie, I just went to your web site and it is wonderful. Gillen and I recently read _Farmer Boy_ so it was fun to see the work you had done on it. From reading a few responses to others (not to mention your incredibly inspiring help here) I can see what a good teacher and writer you are. I have a few homeschooling friends who don't unschool (heck, I don't know anyone in person who unschools) that may be intersted in your program. I'll pass along the info. I don't think that they would force their kids to do it if they weren't into it either.

Madeline
